00.text: Welcome to the Secret Service agent. The General is already waiting for you.

10.text: Glad you made it. You are in good shape.

20.text: Fantastic last mission! Consider using your money to buy upgrades.

30.text: Looks like that Soviet technology isnt that great, huh?

40.text: I know that she is cheating. The last time I've sleeped with the General, I had this feeling.

60.text: Too bad this game is over. We could have had so much more fun.
